title: #157: Divorce, of Course (@JacobSirof & @SherrySirof)
itunes:title: Divorce, Of Course with Jacob Sirof & Sherry Sirof
description: Jacob Sirof and Sherry Sirof (nee East) each had me over to their places of residence to talk about the divorce that they're going through right now. First I went to Moshe Kasher's old place where Jacob is staying. Then a week later I went to their old apartment to talk to Sherry about the same topic. It's an interesting view into two sides of a disolution of the bond of marriage.
